thread.title: Trump repeats false claim about U.S. murder rate
thread.title_full: Trump repeats false claim about U.S. murder rate

author: Philip Bump
title: Trump repeats false claim about U.S. murder rate
text: Trump repeats false claim about U.S. murder rate   President Trump falsely claimed that "the murder rate in our country is the highest it's been in 47 years," during a meeting with county sheriffs on Feb. 7 at the White House. ( ) RELATED LINKS - President Trump falsely claimed that "the murder rate in our country is the highest it's been in 47 years," during a meeting with county sheriffs on Feb. 7 at the White House.
